section.title: Overview
section.description: The Add Text to Memo Field action adds text at any location in a memo field. You can also insert new lines before or after the inserted text.

step.description: Make a selection in the Insert text into a memo in which window? field. This field will be grayed out unless this action is based on a Form or Browse. The choices are:
In the Window Name field select either:
Select the form or browse that you wish to use from the list.
In the Object Name field select a memo field on the form or browse.
In the Text to Insert field enter either a text string or click to use the Expression Builder to create an expression that evaluates to a text string.
Click the Start new line before text check box to insert a blank line before the new text.
Click the Insert new line after text check box to insert a blank line after the new text.
Specify the insertion point for the new text.
